# objc_super

**Structure**

Specifies the superclass of an instance.

## Declaration

```swift
struct objc_super
```

## Discussion

The compiler generates an `objc_super` data structure when it encounters the `super` keyword as the receiver of a message. It specifies the class definition of the particular superclass that should be messaged.

## Fields

- **receiver**: A pointer of type [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/objc_object]. Specifies an instance of a class.
- **super_class**: A pointer to a [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/Class] data structure. Specifies the particular superclass of the instance to message.

## Instance Properties

- **receiver**: A pointer of type [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/objc_object]. Specifies an instance of a class.
- **super_class**: A pointer to a [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/Class] data structure. Specifies the particular superclass of the instance to message.

## Initializers

- **init(receiver:super_class:)**

## Instance Data Types

- **objc_object**: Represents an instance of a class.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
